entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
